statements: SELECT * FROM healthcare_appointments;
SELECT appointment_id, appointment_date, appointment_time FROM healthcare_appointments WHERE appointment_status='scheduled';
SELECT provider_id, appointment_date FROM healthcare_appointments WHERE appointment_status='cancelled' ORDER BY appointment_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM healthcare_appointments WHERE patient_id=123 ORDER BY appointment_date ASC, appointment_time ASC;
SELECT MAX(appointment_id) AS max_appointment_id FROM healthcare_appointments;
SELECT * FROM healthcare_appointments WHERE appointment_date = '2022-08-15';
SELECT appointment_id, appointment_date, appointment_time FROM healthcare_appointments WHERE provider_id = 101 ORDER BY appointment_date ASC, appointment_time ASC;
SELECT patient_id, provider_id, appointment_date, appointment_time FROM healthcare_appointments WHERE appointment_status = 'Scheduled' ORDER BY appointment_date DESC, appointment_time ASC;
SELECT provider_id, COUNT(*) as total_appointments FROM healthcare_appointments GROUP BY provider_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 5 ORDER BY total_appointments DESC;
SELECT appointment_id, patient_id, provider_id, appointment_date, appointment_status FROM healthcare_appointments WHERE provider_id = 202 AND appointment_status = 'Cancelled';
SELECT * FROM Appointments;
SELECT provider_id, patient_id, appointment_date FROM Appointments ORDER BY appointment_date DESC;
SELECT provider_id, appointment_type FROM Appointments WHERE appointment_type = 'Checkup';
SELECT * FROM Providers WHERE specialty = 'Dentist';
SELECT provider_name, phone_number, email FROM Providers ORDER BY provider_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Appointments WHERE provider_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT provider_name, specialty FROM Providers ORDER BY provider_name DESC;
SELECT appointment_id, appointment_date FROM Appointments WHERE appointment_date >= '2023-01-01' AND appointment_type = 'Consultation';
SELECT provider_name, phone_number, email FROM Providers WHERE specialty = 'Dentistry';
SELECT provider_name, appointment_date FROM Providers JOIN Appointments ON Providers.provider_id = Appointments.provider_id WHERE Providers.specialty = 'Cardiology' ORDER BY appointment_date DESC;
SELECT provider_id, provider_name, specialty FROM healthcare_providers;
SELECT appointment_id, provider_id, patient_id, appointment_date, status FROM appointments;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, patient_age, patient_sex FROM patients;
SELECT provider_id, provider_name FROM healthcare_providers WHERE specialty = 'Dentist';
SELECT appointment_id, provider_id, patient_id, appointment_date FROM appointments WHERE status = 'Scheduled';
SELECT * FROM healthcare_providers;
SELECT provider_name, specialty FROM healthcare_providers ORDER BY specialty;
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT specialty) AS unique_specialties FROM healthcare_providers;

SELECT patients.patient_name, appointments.appointment_date, healthcare_providers.provider_name FROM patients JOIN appointments ON patients.patient_id = appointments.patient_id JOIN healthcare_providers ON appointments.provider_id = healthcare_providers.provider_id;

SELECT provider_name, COUNT(appointment_id) AS total_appointments FROM healthcare_providers LEFT JOIN appointments ON healthcare_providers.provider_id = appointments.provider_id GROUP BY provider_name ORDER BY total_appointments DESC;
SELECT * FROM healthcare_providers;
SELECT provider_name, specialty FROM healthcare_providers ORDER BY provider_name DESC;
SELECT provider_name, specialty FROM healthcare_providers WHERE specialty = 'Cardiology';
SELECT * FROM appointments WHERE appointment_date = '2022-10-15';
SELECT patient_name, email FROM patients WHERE patient_id = 123;
SELECT * FROM healthcare_providers WHERE specialty = 'Cardiology';
SELECT patient_name, birthdate FROM patients ORDER BY birthdate DESC;
SELECT provider_name, specialty FROM healthcare_providers WHERE provider_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT appointment_id, appointment_date, status FROM appointments WHERE appointment_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY appointment_date ASC;
SELECT appointment_id, action, action_timestamp FROM appointment_history WHERE action = 'Cancelled';
SELECT * FROM providers;
SELECT provider_name, specialty FROM providers WHERE specialty='Dentist';
SELECT clinic_name, city, state FROM clinics ORDER BY clinic_name ASC;
SELECT appointment_date, appointment_time FROM appointments WHERE appointment_date>'2022-01-01' ORDER BY appointment_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE dob<'1990-01-01';
SELECT * FROM providers WHERE specialty = 'Dentist';
SELECT provider_name, phone_number FROM providers ORDER BY provider_name DESC;
SELECT patient_name, dob, email FROM patients WHERE dob BETWEEN '1980-01-01' AND '1990-12-31';
SELECT clinic_name, address, city FROM clinics WHERE state = 'CA';
SELECT provider_name, specialty, email, phone_number FROM providers INNER JOIN schedules ON providers.provider_id = schedules.provider_id;
